lines:
Cucciarheen

Dummer Academy,

SOUTH BYFIELD, MASS.

1956

CHARLES S. INGHAM, PH.D.,

MASTER.

December 15, 1909. 
Mr. Alfred B. Stearns, Principali

Dear Sir;

Please accept my thanks

for the kind attention you gave to the matter of Luk's

defection from our summer camp and the consequent damage

to our affections. You will find enclosed the receipt for

the check sent to me.

Respectfully yours,

W. H.Cam

han

Stearns, Principali Dear Sir; Please accept my thanks for the kind attention you gave to the matter of Luk's defection from our summer camp and the consequent damage to our affections. You will find enclosed the receipt for the check sent to me. Respectfully yours, W. H.Cam han

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter from W.H. Cunningham, Master of  Dummer Academy, with a receipt for $10 because of S.C. Luk's defection from summer camp and subsequent damage to their affections.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
